name: Only One Meal: A Cook-Crafter Puzzle
name_original: Only One Meal: A Cook-Crafter Puzzle
description:
A little cooking-crafting puzzle game, only one level for now :) . Art and more levels will be updated later! Combine 3 ingredients at a time to create new dishes. Keep combining until you've made Only One Meal! 

Need a hint? A meal needs a Fruity Drink, a Hearty Entree, and a Chocolatey Dessert!

Raw Ingredients 

Apple, Bread, Chocolate, Egg, Flour, Grapes, Milk, Mushrooms, Noodles, Strawberry, Tomato, Water
